Yes, he made a new character in Venture Co. just to find the unschoolers.  His character name is Thömàs, and is a troll priest.

Thanks.  I'll have him keep looking.

Jay

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: wow unschoolers guild
messages.msgSnippet: We would need his name.  For him to find someone in the guild he can type  (minus arrows) in the chat box. It s best if he says who
messages.messageBody:
We would need his name. For him to find someone in the guild he can
type </who horde of unschoolers> (minus arrows) in the chat box.
It's best if he says who his is and maybe your name, and that his mom
is on the Always Learning list, something like that.

If someone doesn't answer him, it may be because they can't read yet,
so ask another.

He's welcome to ask one of my characters: Takulah, Talukah, Ehne, or
Jilam.

Oh, and are you sure he's on the right realm? The Venture Co.

~Jill

On Oct 22, 2008, at 4:14 PM, Jay Ford wrote:

> My son's character Thomas is a level 5 troll priest with blue skin
> with priest quest juju hex robe and red hair. He's trying to find
> guild members and not having much success.

messages.subject: Re: wow unschoolers guild
messages.msgSnippet: My son s character Thomas is a level 5 troll priest with blue skin with priest quest juju hex robe and red hair.  He s trying to find guild members and not
messages.messageBody:
My son's character Thomas is a level 5 troll priest with blue skin with priest quest juju hex robe and red hair.  He's trying to find guild members and not having much success. 

If anyone spots him he'd love to join the guild.  He has a level 70 character in Greymane human warrior Peep, and an Alt character level 52 Frenry also.


Jay

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] wow unschoolers guild
messages.msgSnippet: ... The guild is still running.   Most information and questions get posted at unschooling gamers yahoo group, and a bit at the wow group on the FamilyRUN ning
messages.messageBody:
On Oct 19, 2008, at 5:51 PM, Nicole Willoughby wrote:

> My wow has been off a bit but is back on now . Is the unschoolers
> guild still running? do they have a website or yahoo group? does
> anyone know what realm they play in or how to get invited to the
> guild ?
>
> Thanks,
> Nicole

The guild is still running. Most information and questions get
posted at unschooling gamers yahoo group, and a bit at the wow group
on the FamilyRUN ning site.

Realm: The Venture Co.
Guild name: Horde of Unschoolers
Faction: Horde ;-P

If you tell me your character's name, I can keep and eye out for
you. Don't be surprised if someone doesn't let you in the guild
right away; we've been having a bit of trouble with guild bank
raiding. You can look for my characters... Talukah, Ehne, Takulah.
It helps if you say who you are and that you got the info from which
ever unschooling list.

~Jill

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
